[vc_row row_content_width=”grid” css=”.vc_custom_1588614700672{padding-top: 150px !important;padding-bottom: 149px !important;}” simple_background_color=”#ffffff”][vc_column][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner]

Our Treatment

What is SculptICE® and the herbal ice body sculpting therapy?

[vc_empty_space height=”30px”][vc_column_text]

Sculptice is a 100% natural product, made of a precise combination of herbs, essential oils, and other natural ingredients, that together promote the desolution of adipose tissue in the body. In addition, ice. Sculpting helps to mold, reduce, and reaffirm the skin, by promoting the natural production of collagen and elastin in the body, improving the elasticity and tonicity of the skin.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space height=”60px”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”4182″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][vc_empty_space height=”30px”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]

Ice sculpting is a safe natural product, formulated to help individuals presenting early stages of fat accumulation, all the way to extreme cases of obesity.

Ice sculpting also helps individuals that just want to get rid of unwanted cellulite, or for those that simply want to reaffirm the skin in specific areas of the body.

Benefits

  • Detox your body
  • Helps restore skin elasticity
  • Reduce cellulite
  • Remove resistant fat
  • Activate production of new collagen
  • Activates lymphatic System
  • 100% natural treatment
  • Result are permanent and progressive
  • No surgery
  • Immediate results

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space height=”60px”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]The  revolutionary Body Sculpting therapy massage with sculptice provides proven lasting results, by activating the body’s natural process of fat elimination through a process known as Thermo-genesis, that essentially transform fat into energy.

Ice Sculpting focuses in the elimination of fat tissue, creating satisfactory and long lasting permanent results. The Body Sculpting Massage therapy results have a tendency to slightly vary for different people, since each person has a unique organism that reacts differently to the activation of the Thermo-genesis natural process.

The Body Sculpting therapy produces better results when combined with an active lifestyle and balanced nutrition.

The Ice sculpting specialist will closely work with you, to help you achieve better results. They will use a 360 degree approach to your weight problems, helping you recognize what specific issues may be to blame in your personal case. Once they recognize the main reasons for your weight problems, they will recommend alternative natural products, ideas and activities that will target the core of the problem.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”4186″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_content_width=”grid” css=”.vc_custom_1588709087776{padding-top: 107px !important;padding-bottom: 94px !important;}” parallax_background_image=”4151″][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-offset-2 vc_col-lg-8″][vc_row_inner content_text_aligment=”center”][vc_column_inner][vc_column_text]

Reshape Your Body

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”24px”][vc_column_text]

Body Sculpting Treatments Customized Personally For You

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”24px”] BOOK NOW [/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row]
